channel.title: CVE Feed for Jenkins project -- Jenkins CloudBees AWS Credentials Plugin
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Jenkins project -- Jenkins CloudBees AWS Credentials Plugin

item.title: CVE-2022-27199|2024-08-03T05:25:31.111Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20cloudbees%20aws%20credentials%20plugin
item.description: A missing permission check in Jenkins CloudBees AWS Credentials Plugin 189.v3551d5642995 and earlier allows attackers with Overall/Read permission to connect to an AWS service using an attacker-specified token.

item.title: CVE-2022-27198|2024-08-03T05:25:32.083Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20cloudbees%20aws%20credentials%20plugin
item.description: A cross-site request forgery (CSRF) vulnerability in Jenkins CloudBees AWS Credentials Plugin 189.v3551d5642995 and earlier allows attackers with Overall/Read permission to connect to an AWS service using an attacker-specified token.

item.title: CVE-2021-21625|2024-08-03T18:16:23.692Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20cloudbees%20aws%20credentials%20plugin
item.description: Jenkins CloudBees AWS Credentials Plugin 1.28 and earlier does not perform a permission check in a helper method for HTTP endpoints, allowing attackers with Overall/Read permission to enumerate credentials IDs of AWS credentials stored in Jenkins in some circumstances.
